items.title: SAP Data Analysis for Sales Documents and More
items.headline: A guide for becoming an expert at analyzing SAP table data for troubleshooting, reporting, project planning, & more.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you'll have a great understanding of data entities used in the SAP ECC sales order process, their relationships, and usage.
You'll have a good understanding of many tools involved in analysis and be able to apply this to other processes in SAP as well.
You'll be able to map data from the business object to the table fields.

items.title: SAP SD Course in Nutshell-on ECC&S/4 HANA with Fiori Apps
items.headline: SAP SD-Quick& Effective course to understand & execute Order to Cash End to End flows  in ECC & S/4 HANA for beginners
objectives_summary: This course helps Beginners to Intermediate level of SAP  SD  module aspirants,students,IT Coordinators and managers to understand the Order to Cash Flow in a nutshell as to what are the different features of  Sales order,Delivery ,Invoice and the Incoming Payments

The execution process flow helps the learners to understand the crux of SAP  ECC &S4 HANA  SD Order to Cash flow, different mile stones across the process and a quick execution cycle which paves a way to see the entire process flow and simulate the same for hands on their own systems
SAP Order to Cash Quick execution and understand the essence of the Module flow,features and functions
